name: Alpha: Survival of the Fittest
description:
Become the leader of the Grey Wolf Pack, hunt animals and expand your wolf pack, fight other wolf packs for territory, retake the four corners of the forest and become the Alpha of the Wild!

- Top down zelda style combat
- Build and manage a pack which aids in battle

- Hunt creatures for meat and exp to level up your skills
- Compete with enemy wolf packs for meat resources

- Explore a diverse open world wilderness


This was the first RPG maker game I ever released, I hope it stands the test of time
